senses.sense_definition: To chew food again, usually after it has been swallowed and brought back up.

examples.text: Ruminants such as cattle and sheep regurgitate and <w>remasticate</w> their food.
The animal lay down in the shade to rest and <w>remasticate</w> its cud.

senses.sense_definition: To think about, discuss, or consider a subject again carefully.

examples.text: Matters that had been adjudicated in other courts would not be <w>remasticated</w>.
He sat alone for hours, <w>remasticating</w> the answers he gave during the interview.
